name: Mary Soren
description: I enjoy unusual surprises, amazing, events that can boom my life and bring a fresh wave. On the other hand, all the interesting benchmarks of my life I would prefer to experience together with a close friend, partner, husband, cause I can be also associated with a cosy and desirable home.I’m looking for a good man that will be honest, trusting, and faithful. That will treat me with love and respect. Someone that will communicate with me, and will be my friend and is looking for love and marriage, someone to grow old with and to watch our children being happy with us. I believe that he is waiting for me far away. Talking about some traits of his character, so I would like him to be cheerful, as laughter is important with the ability to love fully and completely. I want to meet a special man to marry, have children with and love for the rest of my life. I am looking for someone I can relax and cuddle up with, take moonlight walks, candlelight dinners, dancing, someone that will still make my heart skip a beat for years to come. I want someone to talk to and share good and bad moments of our common life.
